p: Here, we present results of our experimental study on the Cu(410) surface, using QLEED analyses. To get the optimum (theoretical) energy dependent intensity I( E) curves, we considered slab thickness ranging from 24 to 64 atomic layers, with corresponding relaxed layers ranging from 8 to 32 atomic layers. We confirmed the consistency of the results with Pendry reliability factors R P < 0.2. In the following, we give a detailed discussion of the relaxation (perpendicular and lateral displacements) of the surface atoms.
